public static java.util.Collection<Annotation> DecollapseByIntronLocation(java.util.Collection<Annotation> exons,
                                                                          java.util.Collection<Annotation> introns,
                                                                          java.lang.String strand)
This method returns only exons that are trimmed down by intron location. If its fully within intron it just returns it. If bases overlap intron it trims down

Parameters:
exons -
introns -
strand -
